title.narrative: 1.Research / Knowledge and Mobilization:1.3 Documentation of direct and indirect cases of violations against women with disabilities: whereby women with disabilities are more empowered by receiving legal and psychosocial support(outcome).

description.narrative:
The outputs of this activity were achieved as planned with additional intervention developed based on findings during documentation as follows:
Documentation of GBV cases of people with disabilities with referral to relevant service providers including psychological, legal and livelihood. Number of cases assessed and referred during this year is 273 from Amman, Karak, Ajloun, Zarqa, Irbid, Mafraq, Jerash, Balqa and Tafileh.
 Documentation of GBV cases of women and girls with disabilities- 273 field visits to document GBV cases of women and girls with disabilities by 6 trained field workers in Karak Ajloun Sweileh and Zarqa as well as Tafileh. All age-groups are represented.  One of the main findings during the assessment was the need for mobility aids, therefore the project’s partner provided multiple mobility aids to 194 people with disability including wheelchairs, Crutches, walkers, bath wheelchair, beds and oxygen tubes.  6 Advocacy meetings :With the outbreak of the COVID 19 pandemic and the post-pandemic consequences especially in regards to domestic violence and violence against women and women with disability, 6 meetings were held with members of the parliament and stakeholders from the Ministry of Social Development, the Higher Council for the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, Ministry of Political & Parliamentary Affairs, Human Rights Department at the Prime Ministry, Human Rights Center , to set the ground to advocate for the implementation and activation of the law on the Rights of People with Disabilities (PWD) which was endorsed by the Jordanian Lower House in May 2017 but is not exercised. In addition, 18 focus Group discussion were held in Karak Ajloun Sweileh and Zarqa as well as Tafileh during the reporting period.
